name: molgenis-cosas
description: The `molgenis-cosas` repository contains all of the code and scripts used to create the samples database. The EMX is defined in a series of `.yml` files (see `data/_emx`) and converted using the `yml_to_emx` function.

scripts.build: npm run build-cosas && npm run build-cosasrefs && npm run build-cosasportal
